original_text: And behold, a woman of the city, who was a sinner, when she learned that he was reclining at table in the Pharisee's house, brought an alabaster flask of ointment,
korean_text: 그 동네에 죄를 지은 한 여자가 있어 예수께서 바리새인의 집에 앉아 계심을 알고 향유 담은 옥합을 가지고 와서

sentences.original_text: when she learned that he was reclining at table
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 식탁에 앉아 계신 것을 알고,

sentences.original_text: brought an alabaster flask of ointment,
